entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Partial properties on struct warn about field ordering #74679
  • Stack overflow when compiling incorrectly formed attribute argument string #74677
  • Collection Expression Generated Types miss the [CompilerGenerated] attribute #74676
  • InlineArray in generic class #74673

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35206.64 #74672

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.VisualStudio.Debugger.Contracts to 17.12.0-beta.24403.1 #74678
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove test dependency from BuildValidator #74669
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Unify on-the-fly docs settings with C++ #74663
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix CG issue for Microsoft.IO.Redist #74653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractSymbolCompletionProvider.CreateItems #74670
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
